40 struct HingeJointInfo : public JointInfo {

42  public :
43

45

51 
53  bool isLimitEnabled;
54

61

65 
67  decimal motorSpeed;
68 
71  decimal maxMotorTorque;
72 
74 
82  HingeJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
83  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace,
84  const Vector3& initRotationAxisWorld)
85  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::HINGEJOINT),
86  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace),
87  rotationAxisWorld(initRotationAxisWorld), isLimitEnabled(false),
88  isMotorEnabled(false), minAngleLimit(-1), maxAngleLimit(1),
89  motorSpeed(0), maxMotorTorque(0) {}
90 
92 
100  HingeJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
101  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace,
102  const Vector3& initRotationAxisWorld,
103  decimal initMinAngleLimit, decimal initMaxAngleLimit)
104  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::HINGEJOINT),
105  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace),
106  rotationAxisWorld(initRotationAxisWorld), isLimitEnabled(true),
107  isMotorEnabled(false), minAngleLimit(initMinAngleLimit),
108  maxAngleLimit(initMaxAngleLimit), motorSpeed(0),
109  maxMotorTorque(0) {}
110 
112 
122  HingeJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
123  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace,
124  const Vector3& initRotationAxisWorld,
125  decimal initMinAngleLimit, decimal initMaxAngleLimit,
126  decimal initMotorSpeed, decimal initMaxMotorTorque)
127  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::HINGEJOINT),
128  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace),
129  rotationAxisWorld(initRotationAxisWorld), isLimitEnabled(true),
130  isMotorEnabled(false), minAngleLimit(initMinAngleLimit),
131  maxAngleLimit(initMaxAngleLimit), motorSpeed(initMotorSpeed),
132  maxMotorTorque(initMaxMotorTorque) {}
133 };

343 
344 // Return true if the limits of the joint are enabled
348 inline bool HingeJoint::isLimitEnabled() const {
349  return mIsLimitEnabled;
350 }
351 
352 // Return true if the motor of the joint is enabled
356 inline bool HingeJoint::isMotorEnabled() const {
357  return mIsMotorEnabled;
358 }
359 
360 // Return the minimum angle limit
364 inline decimal HingeJoint::getMinAngleLimit() const {
365  return mLowerLimit;
366 }
367 
368 // Return the maximum angle limit
372 inline decimal HingeJoint::getMaxAngleLimit() const {
373  return mUpperLimit;
374 }
375 
376 // Return the motor speed
380 inline decimal HingeJoint::getMotorSpeed() const {
381  return mMotorSpeed;
382 }
383 
384 // Return the maximum motor torque
388 inline decimal HingeJoint::getMaxMotorTorque() const {
389  return mMaxMotorTorque;
390 }
391 
392 // Return the intensity of the current torque applied for the joint motor
397 inline decimal HingeJoint::getMotorTorque(decimal timeStep) const {
398  return mImpulseMotor / timeStep;
399 }
400 
401 // Return the number of bytes used by the joint
402 inline size_t HingeJoint::getSizeInBytes() const {
403  return sizeof(HingeJoint);
404 }
405 
406 // Return a string representation
407 inline std::string HingeJoint::to_string() const {
408  return "HingeJoint{ lowerLimit=" + std::to_string(mLowerLimit) + ", upperLimit=" + std::to_string(mUpperLimit) +
409  "localAnchorPointBody1=" + mLocalAnchorPointBody1.to_string() + ", localAnchorPointBody2=" +
410  mLocalAnchorPointBody2.to_string() + ", hingeLocalAxisBody1=" + mHingeLocalAxisBody1.to_string() +
411  ", hingeLocalAxisBody2=" + mHingeLocalAxisBody2.to_string() + ", initOrientationDifferenceInv=" +
412  mInitOrientationDifferenceInv.to_string() + ", motorSpeed=" + std::to_string(mMotorSpeed) +
413  ", maxMotorTorque=" + std::to_string(mMaxMotorTorque) + ", isLimitEnabled=" +
414  (mIsLimitEnabled ? "true" : "false") + ", isMotorEnabled=" + (mIsMotorEnabled ? "true" : "false") + "}";
415 }
416 
417 }
418 
419
